channel.title: Hosting Your Own Email Server - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Make sure your VSP unblocks port 25 Allow ports using your firewall ufw allow 25/tcp ufw allow 587/tcpInstall mailutils apt install -y mailutils postfixSelect “internet site” in the gui. Then enter your domain name “example.com” (Screenshot) Reverse DNS (rDNS) Email servers may require a PTR record to prevent spam In vultr (VPS) make sure your reverse DNS is set to your domain name. Do this for both ipv4 and ipv6 under settings.
